overview:
I work with some of the world’s biggest and best companies in making business outcomes something that is predictable and strategic. There’s such confusion about so many things related to getting work done that it just seems like a great idea to cut through the jargon and the prejudices and to have a real discussion of what companies are doing that works well. I’m fortunate to work for a large company that has exposure to fantastic customer stories.

When not solving workplace challenges, we’re traveling the world and having as much adventure as possible. Our personal stories are found at www.maximumadventure.net.
